revised_title: A New Definition of Electronegativity Based on Bond Strengths
tldr: The author proposes a new definition of electronegativity based on the stretching force constant of the bond between an atom or group and hydrogen. This definition aims to be simple, widely applicable, and satisfy the qualitative connotations of electronegativity. The author compares this new definition with previous definitions by Mulliken and Pauling, and discusses its applications and potential difficulties.
